invocations.description: Will send a private message with content msg using the navigation system to the character charname. The character must be in the same navigation channel as you, and you must be in a navi channel to use this function. To read a received message you must setup a navmessages function.
invocations.ex:
init start
	function navmessages(msg)
		print(msg) -- will print information about the message you just received
	end
init end

navpm('bubble', 'combo ' .. $attacked.name)
invocations.exDescription: Will send a private message to Bubble asking him to issue a combo at your currently attacked creature. And it will print every message you receive on your current navigation channel.
